mechanics.condition: Wizard has not yet selected an Arcane Tradition
mechanics.outcome: Wizard selects one Arcane Tradition from available options; Wizard gains the specific 2nd-level feature of the chosen Arcane Tradition

mechanics.trigger: Wizard character achieves a new level
mechanics.condition: Wizard has selected an Arcane Tradition AND (Wizard's level is 6 OR Wizard's level is 10 OR Wizard's level is 14)
mechanics.outcome: Wizard gains the specific Arcane Tradition feature for their current level

description_text: When you reach 2nd level, you choose an arcane tradition, shaping your practice of magic through one of eight schools, such as Evocation. Your choice grants you features at 2nd level and again at 6th, 10th, and 14th level.
